Author: Royal_Flu$h
Description: Decrypt three ciphers and input the correct button combinations across eight stages.
Name: The Cube

Souvenir.Explanation: Souvenir could ask about the cube rotations, since they cease after solve. The cube faces could also be asked if Souvenir blanks them out. Asking for the symbols on the left and bottom screens would probably be too much and also require special font support.
